title: Leadership Practical Skills Development: Problem-Based Case Review Workshops for Enhancing Pharmacy Education Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners improve their ability to identify drug interactions with over 80% accuracy through case analyses based on real-world medical scenarios.
Learners practice establishing patient-tailored treatment plans in a multidisciplinary team collaboration environment at least three times.
Learners evaluate their decision-making skills in complex clinical situations by applying a problem-based learning (PBL) approach.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
